[vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Summer chill with fine snacks and the collection of Veuve Clicquot champagne [/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Experience the ultimate of summer in Zagreb and visit vibrant Esplanade 1925 Lounge & Cocktail bar terrace in the heart of the city. Soak up the cosmopolitan vibe and amazing views. It’s the perfect place to unwind and enjoy top-notch service from our charming bartenders.

Indulge in a delectable selection of fine snacks crafted to perfection, featuring favorites like Club sandwich, burger, Caesar salad, traditional Esplanade štrukli, savory pie, crunchy croquettes, and exquisite tuna tataki with avocado. For a truly memorable dining experience, share our specially menu designed for four, offering the best of classic dishes to be enjoyed together.

Complement your meal with a glass, bottle, or magnum of chilled French Veuve Clicquot Champagne, and let the bubbles elevate your evening.

Our expertly crafted cocktails add a refreshing touch, perfect for savoring those warm summer nights.

With a great ambience and a cosmopolitan atmosphere, our terrace bar is the ideal spot for a relaxing evening out or a lively get-together with friends. Join us in the centre of Zagreb and discover the perfect blend of amazing views, delightful food by Chef Ana Grgić Tomić, and an unforgettable summer experience.

 

  • Summer Menu: Best of Classics X Champagne

 

Book your table:

  1. +385 1 45 666 33

Esplanade1925@esplanade.hr[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space]

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
